languages.text: "Их множество. Я нахожусь в постоянном поиске средств против опасных недугов. Моя последняя работа — изучение крайне летальной хвори, пожирающей плоть и кожу. Она унесла жизни десятка человек, но их смерти были не напрасны: я узнал многое о враге, и вакцина скоро будет готова к испытаниям".

"There are many. I am ever in search of solutions to dangerous afflictions. My latest work involved studying a particularly lethal disease that devours the person's flesh and skin. It has already claimed a dozen lives, but their deaths were not in vain: I have learned much about the enemy, and the vaccine will soon be ready for testing."
languages.original_text: "Их множество. Я нахожусь в постоянном поиске средств против опасных недугов. Моя последняя работа — изучение крайне летальной хвори, пожирающей плоть и кожу. Она унесла жизни десятка человек, но их смерти были не напрасны: я узнал многое о враге, и вакцина скоро будет готова к испытаниям".

languages.text: "Da gibt es viele. Ich bin immer auf der Suche nach Lösungen für gefährliche Beschwerden. Meine jüngste Studie befasst sich mit einer besonders tödlichen Krankheit, die Haut und Fleisch des Patienten aufzehrt. Sie hat bereits Dutzende Leben gekostet, aber die Leute sind nicht umsonst gestorben. Ich habe viel über den Feind gelernt und der Impfstoff kann in Kürze getestet werden."
languages.original_text: "There are many. I am ever in search of solutions to dangerous afflictions. My latest work involved studying a particularly lethal disease that devours the person's flesh and skin. It has already claimed a dozen lives, but their deaths were not in vain: I have learned much about the enemy, and the vaccine will soon be ready for testing."

traits.locale_text: "Da gibt es viele. Ich bin immer auf der Suche nach Lösungen für gefährliche Beschwerden. Meine jüngste Studie befasst sich mit einer besonders tödlichen Krankheit, die Haut und Fleisch des Patienten aufzehrt. Sie hat bereits Dutzende Leben gekostet, aber die Leute sind nicht umsonst gestorben. Ich habe viel über den Feind gelernt und der Impfstoff kann in Kürze getestet werden."

languages.text: « Elles sont fort nombreuses. Je cherche en permanence des remèdes aux affections dangereuses. Mes derniers travaux en date m'ont conduit à étudier un virus particulièrement meurtrier qui dévore la chair et la peau de son hôte. Il a déjà fait une bonne dizaine de victimes, mais leur mort n'aura pas été vaine. Elles m'ont beaucoup appris sur l'ennemi à combattre, et le vaccin sera bientôt prêt à passer en phase de test. »
languages.original_text: "There are many. I am ever in search of solutions to dangerous afflictions. My latest work involved studying a particularly lethal disease that devours the person's flesh and skin. It has already claimed a dozen lives, but their deaths were not in vain: I have learned much about the enemy, and the vaccine will soon be ready for testing."

traits.locale_text: « Elles sont fort nombreuses. Je cherche en permanence des remèdes aux affections dangereuses. Mes derniers travaux en date m'ont conduit à étudier un virus particulièrement meurtrier qui dévore la chair et la peau de son hôte. Il a déjà fait une bonne dizaine de victimes, mais leur mort n'aura pas été vaine. Elles m'ont beaucoup appris sur l'ennemi à combattre, et le vaccin sera bientôt prêt à passer en phase de test. »

languages.text: «Hay muchos. Siempre ando en busca de remedios para las aflicciones más peligrosas. Mi trabajo más reciente consiste en estudiar una enfermedad particularmente letal que devora la piel y la carne de la víctima. Ya se ha cobrado una docena de vidas, pero sus muertes no han sido en vano: he aprendido mucho sobre el enemigo, y pronto estaré en condiciones de probar una vacuna».
languages.original_text: "There are many. I am ever in search of solutions to dangerous afflictions. My latest work involved studying a particularly lethal disease that devours the person's flesh and skin. It has already claimed a dozen lives, but their deaths were not in vain: I have learned much about the enemy, and the vaccine will soon be ready for testing."

traits.locale_text: «Hay muchos. Siempre ando en busca de remedios para las aflicciones más peligrosas. Mi trabajo más reciente consiste en estudiar una enfermedad particularmente letal que devora la piel y la carne de la víctima. Ya se ha cobrado una docena de vidas, pero sus muertes no han sido en vano: he aprendido mucho sobre el enemigo, y pronto estaré en condiciones de probar una vacuna».

languages.text: 「たくさんありますよ。私は常に厄介な病気の解決策を探し求めています。直近の仕事は、人の肉と皮膚を蝕む、とりわけ致死率の高い病気の研究でした。すでに十数人の命が奪われていますが、その死は無駄ではありません。敵について多くのことを学びましたし、ワクチンも間もなく試験できるようになるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "There are many. I am ever in search of solutions to dangerous afflictions. My latest work involved studying a particularly lethal disease that devours the person's flesh and skin. It has already claimed a dozen lives, but their deaths were not in vain: I have learned much about the enemy, and the vaccine will soon be ready for testing."

traits.locale_text: 「たくさんありますよ。私は常に厄介な病気の解決策を探し求めています。直近の仕事は、人の肉と皮膚を蝕む、とりわけ致死率の高い病気の研究でした。すでに十数人の命が奪われていますが、その死は無駄ではありません。敵について多くのことを学びましたし、ワクチンも間もなく試験できるようになるでしょう」

languages.text: “有很多很多新的方法，我一直在寻找治愈危险疾病的方法。我最近的研究，就是为了治愈某种极其致命的病症。这种病症会吞噬人的皮肤与血肉，已经夺走了十几条生命。不过，那些人的死都是有价值的，能让我更好地了解我的敌人。这种病症的疫苗很快就会进行测试了。”
languages.original_text: "There are many. I am ever in search of solutions to dangerous afflictions. My latest work involved studying a particularly lethal disease that devours the person's flesh and skin. It has already claimed a dozen lives, but their deaths were not in vain: I have learned much about the enemy, and the vaccine will soon be ready for testing."

traits.locale_text: “有很多很多新的方法，我一直在寻找治愈危险疾病的方法。我最近的研究，就是为了治愈某种极其致命的病症。这种病症会吞噬人的皮肤与血肉，已经夺走了十几条生命。不过，那些人的死都是有价值的，能让我更好地了解我的敌人。这种病症的疫苗很快就会进行测试了。”

languages.text: "Çok sayıdalar. Sürekli olarak tehlikeli hastalıklar konusunda çözüm arayışındayımdır. Son çalışmalarım sırasında kişinin etini ve derisini tüketen, son derece ölümcül bir hastalık üzerine eğildim. On kadar cana mal olmuştu ama ölümleri boşa gitmedi. Düşman konusunda çok fazla şey öğrendim ve aşı, çok yakında teste hazır hâle gelecek."
languages.original_text: "There are many. I am ever in search of solutions to dangerous afflictions. My latest work involved studying a particularly lethal disease that devours the person's flesh and skin. It has already claimed a dozen lives, but their deaths were not in vain: I have learned much about the enemy, and the vaccine will soon be ready for testing."
